title: Macarrão mediterrâneo
description: Spaghetti pasta with seafood and spices, specialty of the kitchen. Caution: Contains shrimp and other seafood!

description: Pasta with seafood and spices, specialty of the kitchen. Caution: Contains shrimp and other seafood!

title: Macarrão com chilli
description: Fettuccine pasta with chilli sauce and spices.

description: House salad (lettuce, arugula, carrot) with salmon.

description: Beef steak (150g) on the plate, with fries. Comes with rice and sauces.

description: 400g of chopped picanha, with grilled vegetables and pasta chosen by the customer.

description: 100% vegan Lasagna made with soy meat and special pasta.

description: Salad with avocado, mango, lettuce, chickpeas and more.

title: Almôndegas
